recommendations: January 19, 2017, John managed Amit Yougesh directly

Amit reported to me for pre-sales and project management for key customer projects while I was at OSSCube. Amit was extremely dedicated and passionate about customer success. He worked closely with sales to provide the technical support and demos required to close deals and then took responsibility project delivery.  Amit demonstrated excellent interpersonal and problem solving skills and successfully coordinated global delivery resources I could always count on him to deliver effectively, efficiently and with a smile.

summary: Executive Vice PresidentI am the consummate go-to-market strategist with a track record of accelerating revenue growth for several companies and divisions of large enterprises like companies such as IBM Global Services and Digital Equipment. With a consistent track record of increasing market share, I was tapped to turn around companies, divisions and projects, adding customers by finding solutions to complex issues. Positioning start-ups in the market, I retained disgruntled customers and led teams to successful project completion. I established value propositions, crafted marketing strategies, and guided sales to build pipelines. * Capitalizing on installed customer base and expanding into new markets* Developing and distributing marketing messages globally using internet and social media sites* Establishing customer relationships in public and private sectors, building company value* Forming joint venture partnerships with major companies such as CISCO and Intel* Reengineering product designs, coordinating launches across internal and external stakeholdersI am known by colleagues as a visionary leader with the ability to drive major initiatives and capture and manage key customer accounts.  My education includes a degree in Industrial Electronics Engineering from Worcester Industrial Technical Institute and a Certificate in Training and Development from the University of Michigan.
